Class BasicPlayerWeaponFactory

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.WeaponFactory
sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.BasicPlayerWeaponFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Factory<Weapon>
public class BasicPlayerWeaponFactory extends WeaponFactory
Factory class for creating a basic weapon for the player, represented by a basic projectile. This class extends WeaponFactory and provides customization for projectile template and weapon creation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class sk.stuba.fiit.factories.weaponfactories.WeaponFactory

    positionOfAttacker, projectileFactory, projectileTemplate, radiusOfAttacker, weapon

    Description

    Default constructor that initializes the factory with default values for the radius and position of the attacker.

    Constructor to initialize the basic player weapon factory with a specific radius and position of the attacker.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    adjustProjectileTemplate()
    Adjusts the projectile template to define the characteristics of the basic projectile, including its texture, size, speed, damage, and collision properties.

    Creates an instance of a basic player weapon using the provided arguments.

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicPlayerWeaponFactory

      public BasicPlayerWeaponFactory(float radiusOfAttacker, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 positionOfAttacker)
      Constructor to initialize the basic player weapon factory with a specific radius and position of the attacker.
      Parameters:
      radiusOfAttacker - the radius of the attacker (weapon's range or area of effect)
      positionOfAttacker - the position of the attacker (weapon's firing point)

    • BasicPlayerWeaponFactory

      public BasicPlayerWeaponFactory()
      Default constructor that initializes the factory with default values for the radius and position of the attacker.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public Weapon create(Object... args)
      Creates an instance of a basic player weapon using the provided arguments. This method constructs a weapon with a basic projectile.
      Parameters:
      args - optional arguments used for customization (not used in this factory)
      Returns:
      the newly created Weapon instance

    • adjustProjectileTemplate

      public void adjustProjectileTemplate()
      Adjusts the projectile template to define the characteristics of the basic projectile, including its texture, size, speed, damage, and collision properties.
      Specified by:
      adjustProjectileTemplate in class WeaponFactory
